QuestData.Title: Into The Pit!
QuestData.Description: The felstalker pits?!$b$bThere's no time to waste, $n!$b$b I canna' tell ye what the Burnin' Legion has planned for ol' Brambley, but it canna' be good!$b$bHurry! We've got to find him before the Burnin' Legion has their way with him!
QuestData.AreaDescription: Escort Angus to Felmaw Cavern in Felsoul Hold.
QuestData.LogDescription: Escort Angus to Felmaw Cavern in Felsoul Hold.
QuestData.CompletionText: We've got to get to the felstalker pits an' save Brambley!
QuestData.RewardText: It canna' be true!$b$bBrambley... my dear ol' friend! Why did ye have to go an' die?
